programme.title: Murder in Kermadec
programme.desc: A man is found dead at the foot of a cliff in a small quiet fishing village. Captain Breguet who wanted to leave the region will have to stay a little longer to solve this crime. She will find a mysterious man on her way and fight to protect her daughter.

programme.title: Lemonade
programme.desc: Mara, a young Romanian mother, is a caretaker in the US on a temporary visa. Life seemed perfect after she got married and brought her son over. However, she faces abuses of power from the officer in her green card process, who seeks to exploit her plight.

programme.title: All For Diego
programme.desc: Pablo and Diego are two brothers working as dishwashers at a bar while playing soccer in the afternoons. After Diego falls victim to a hit and run, Pablo enters into a soccer tournament in order to pay for the surgeries needed to keep his brother alive.

programme.title: Deserted
programme.desc: While on assignment to the Sinai coast, Swedish photojournalist Ingrid is kidnapped by a group of Palestinian men and hidden in the desert. An unlikely love affair arises between Ingrid and one of her captors, Ali.

programme.title: Above the Clouds
programme.desc: After losing his parents in a flood, 15-year-old Andy is forced to live in the Mountain Province with his estranged grandfather. Feeling they’ve lost everything, the two embark on a journey and start to come to terms with their grief.

programme.title: Lost In Marseille
programme.desc: Bruno, a stay-at-home father of two, gets back in touch with his masculinity when his wife is kidnapped in Marseille. Instead of the planned holiday on the Côte d'Azur, Bruno gets deeper and deeper into an intrigue, pursued by police and mafia.

programme.title: Gluttony
programme.desc: Sakshi, Varun, and Saif appear to be entangled in a simple love triangle, but beneath the affair lies a sinister secret. Sakshi’s affair with Saif hides deeper horrors, as dark secrets between her and Varun surface.

programme.title: Three Times Nothing
programme.desc: When three homeless friends win the lottery, they assume their lives are going to change drastically for the better. But claiming the money turns out to be more of a problem than a solution.

programme.title: Looking For Jacques
programme.desc: Based on a book and an original TV series from the 80s, Carina is a journalist digging into the disappearance of Jacques, a successful author. She is desperate for a juicy story to land a great job but the more she finds out, the less she wants to share.

programme.title: Europa

programme.title: Lost In Marseille
programme.desc: Bruno, a stay-at-home father of two, gets back in touch with his masculinity when his wife is kidnapped in Marseille. Instead of the planned holiday on the Côte d'Azur, Bruno gets deeper and deeper into an intrigue, pursued by police and mafia.

programme.title: Looking For Jacques
programme.desc: Based on a book and an original TV series from the 80s, Carina is a journalist digging into the disappearance of Jacques, a successful author. She is desperate for a juicy story to land a great job but the more she finds out, the less she wants to share.

programme.title: Europa
programme.desc: Kamal has fled Iraq to try to enter "Fortress Europe". At the Turkish-Bulgarian border, local mercenaries are ruthlessly hunting down migrants. Alone in the forest, Kamal has three days to escape.

programme.title: For A Moment, Forever
programme.desc: A young popstar overwhelmed by fame meets a troubled ex-rocker teaching music to adolescents at a therapy centre. Both longing for love, they get closer as affection for music connects them, but shall they overcome the burdens of his past?

programme.title: Patchwork Family
programme.desc: Christian is a divorced father who can only see his young daughter Vanessa every other weekend. When he meets the single mother Christine and decides to participate in a summer TV show, his whole life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Run Up!
programme.desc: After a life-altering accident shatters her dreams, Elodie, a young hiker turned paraplegic, discovers the power of wheelchair sports. With the help of her trainer Isabelle, she is able to awaken from her lethargy and recognize true victories in life.

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump
programme.desc: When Grump's wife dies, he sees no reason to live on. But just as his coffin is finished, Grump gets a new spark and a major secret! His teenage granddaughter is in trouble and needs help and wisdom from her grandfather, and the warmth of his fireplace.

programme.title: Commitment Hasan
programme.desc: Farmer Hasan is at a crossroads between challenges and new opportunities. A high-voltage mast can end up in the middle of his fertile and cultivated land. But can this invasion of modernity be resolved now that the neighbouring plot is for sale?

programme.title: Hunt For The Bosses
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Duisburg Mafia Murders in 2007. Late night, Antonio Russo leaves his restaurant with his nephew and employees. Suddenly two gunmen appear and open fire. Investigations lead to a village in Italy from which all victims originate.

programme.title: Heart Of A Lion
programme.desc: Teppo, the leader of a gang of neo-nazis, falls in love with Sari. To his shock, Sari’s son is black, and Teppo finds his prejudices and loyalties pitted against his desire for love and family.

programme.title: Binti
programme.desc: Faced with potential deportation as an immigrant, Binti, a 12-year-old vlogger plots a scheme with her new friend to bring their parents together to save her future.

programme.title: On The Edge
programme.desc: On a taxi ride to see his family, a man meets and shares the ride with mysterious hitchhikers and strangers.

programme.title: A Son
programme.desc: A family’s holiday in Tunisia ends in disaster, when their 10-year-old son Aziz is shot during a terrorist ambush. At the hospital where Aziz is in desperate need of a transplant, the family discovers a long-buried secret.
